author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
I've come home for one night from being on tour with The Darkness and I wanted to talk about Ace Frehley, whose death was announced last week. We had a misunderstanding last year. At the time it was described as a 'feud'  (much like the recent coverage of my opinions regarding Yungblud).  It wasn't that and we talked about it. I still have regrets though. 
The full Rock News Desk report can be found here: https://youtu.be/-UyccVYAMTI?si=eoj07owGE_wE3181

To see Justin Hawkins Rides Again LIVE across the UK in January and February, find details here: 
https://www.aegpresents.co.uk/event/justin-hawkins-rides-again/

To see The Darkness on tour in Europe and the USA: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

My Patreon is here: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

For Cameo messages: https://www.cameo.com/justinhawkins

The latest Darkness album "Dreams On Toast" is here: https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvic
title: Remembering Ace Frehley - the Rock Legend who could take a joke...
